item.title: CVE-2024-34389|2024-08-02T02:51:11.415Z -- af%20themes -- wp%20post%20author
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in AF themes WP Post Author.This issue affects WP Post Author: from n/a through 3.6.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-37101|2024-07-22T09:56:00.473Z -- af%20themes -- wp%20post%20author
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AF themes WP Post Author allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Post Author: from n/a through 3.6.7.
